name: Falling Into You 0.55
description:
You've seemed to have had a lot of bad luck. Like really bad luck. But lucky for you (for once), the perfect person appears right in front of you at the perfect time. But is any of it really that perfect?

This is a demo, consisting of around the first half of the game. There's no sound at the moment... I plan to finish this project in the near future.

For the time being, there's no adult content in this game.

If you play this, I'd really love to hear what you think🙇
